name: jss
description: A lib for generating Style Sheets with JavaScript.

scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd && npm run build:tests
scripts.build:lib: babel src --out-dir lib && npm run build:flow
scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\u001b[35m\u001b[1mLove JSS? You can now support us on open collective:\u001b[22m\u001b[39m\n > \u001b[34mhttps://opencollective.com/jss/donate\u001b[0m')"
